author: The Newspaper's Staff Reporter
title: ‚ÄòBlack day‚Äô in Sindh varsities on Dec 2 over contractual appointments
text:
KARACHI: University teachers across Sindh will observe a ‚Äòblack day‚Äô on Dec 2 in protest against the provincial government‚Äôs decision of contractual appointments on campuses.
This was announced in a joint statement released by representatives of Federation of All Pakistan Universities Academic Staff Association (Fapuasa), Sindh chapter, and Karachi University Teachers‚Äô Society (Kuts) on Thursday at after holding a meeting at Karachi University (KU).
The teachers warned that if the government didn‚Äôt take notice of their concerns over contractual appointments, they might decide to boycott classes from the next academic session.
‚ÄúWe condemn contractual appointments. It‚Äôs a violation of the autonomous status of universities that would open doors for political intervention in their affairs,‚Äù says the statement.
It criticises Chief Minister Syed Murad Ali Shah‚Äôs decision to ban appointments, pointing out that the selection boards allow universities to make appointments.
‚ÄúUnlike other public sector institutions, universities have an appointment system of their own, governed by their codes under which teachers start their careers as lecturers and are promoted to higher posts through a selection board held at each promotion and appointment.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs unfortunate that while the 18the Constitutional Amendment granted provincial autonomy, the Sindh government is moving towards centralisation and the decisions of universities‚Äô statutory bodies are also being approved by the chief minister. It seems that the provincial government wants to run universities like local bodies.‚Äù
The attendees of the meeting included Prof Akhtiar Ali Ghumro, Dr Abdur Rehman Nangraj, Dr Mohsin Ali and Dr Asif Hussain Samoo, among others.
Published in Dawn, November 29th, 2024

author: diego.quiroga@pulzo.com
title: Se acabaron los tragos amargos de YouTube y ahora usuarios disfrutar√°n m√°s de los videos
text:
Diego Quiroga Ussa
YouTube ha anunciado una transformaci√≥n significativa en su sistema publicitario, la cual entrar√° en vigor el 12 de mayo de 2025. Con estas modificaciones, la plataforma pretende optimizar la experiencia de los espectadores y maximizar los ingresos de los creadores de contenido sin afectar la continuidad de los videos.
(Ver tambi√©n: Mujer gana $ 350 millones al a√±o en YouTube, pero conserva su empleo en una empresa)
Estos cambios buscan equilibrar la monetizaci√≥n y la experiencia de los espectadores, permitiendo que los creadores retengan a su audiencia mientras generan ingresos de manera m√°s eficiente. Con menos interrupciones y mayor control sobre la publicidad, YouTube apuesta por una experiencia m√°s amigable para todos.
Si bien los anuncios representan una fuente crucial de ingresos tanto para la empresa como para los ‚Äòyoutubers‚Äô, muchos usuarios se han quejado de que interrumpen la fluidez de los videos. Para solucionar esto, YouTube reducir√° la frecuencia de los anuncios intermedios (mid-roll ads) y los situar√° en ‚Äúpuntos de interrupci√≥n naturales, como pausas y transiciones‚Äù, en lugar de los tradicionales ‚Äúpuntos de interrupci√≥n‚Äù que pod√≠an resultar molestos.
Nuevas herramientas para mejorar la monetizaci√≥n
Para asistir a los creadores en la optimizaci√≥n de sus estrategias de publicidad, YouTube implementar√° dos nuevas funciones:
- Retroalimentaci√≥n sobre anuncios intermedios: desde YouTube Studio, los creadores podr√°n recibir informaci√≥n sobre si sus espacios publicitarios resultan intrusivos para los espectadores. En caso necesario, tendr√°n la posibilidad de reubicarlos en pausas naturales.
- Ubicaci√≥n autom√°tica de anuncios: el sistema de YouTube podr√° identificar de manera inteligente los momentos m√°s adecuados dentro del video para insertar los anuncios sin afectar la experiencia del usuario. No obstante, los creadores podr√°n seguir colocando anuncios manualmente y permitir que la plataforma encuentre ubicaciones adicionales m√°s naturales.
(Ver tambi√©n: ¬øC√≥mo usar YouTube sin necesidad de Internet? Este es el truco poco conocido)
¬øQu√© transformaciones traer√° la publicidad de YouTube?
La empresa asegura que esta actualizaci√≥n traer√° beneficios sustanciales. En un experimento realizado en julio de 2024, los canales que activaron la funci√≥n autom√°tica de anuncios ‚Äòmid-roll‚Äô experimentaron un incremento promedio de m√°s del 5 % en sus ingresos publicitarios en comparaci√≥n con aquellos que solo empleaban anuncios manuales.
Seg√∫n un comunicado oficial publicado en su p√°gina de soporte, YouTube actualizar√° tanto los videos recientes como aquellos subidos antes del 24 de febrero de 2025 para adaptarlos a este nuevo esquema de publicidad. No obstante, los creadores de contenido podr√°n desactivar esta funci√≥n desde la pesta√±a de ‚ÄòGanancias‚Äô en YouTube Studio y administrar manualmente sus anuncios intermedios.
* Pulzo.com se escribe con Z
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->media and entertainment industry

author: ComDir
title: Life After a Terrorist Attack in Kenya
text: Young Survivor Displays Resilience, Transformation, and Gratitude to ICC 03/08/2024 Kenya (International Christian Concern) ‚Äî Rebekah is a Kenyan victim and survivor of a terrorist attack that occurred three years ago in Katito, Kisumu County. The incident was perpetrated by a neighbor who was associated with the al-Shabab terrorists, although young Rebekah and her family were unaware of his affiliation. The family was sitting outside after dinner when the attack occurred. Their unsuspecting neighbor stopped by, seemingly with good intentions, and to chat. Rebekah‚Äôs family warmly welcomed him. To their shock, however, the neighbor carried and detonated a bomb. Rebekah‚Äôs parents and the terrorist were killed instantly. Rebekah sustained severe injuries, including losing three fingers, yet miraculously survived. Rebekah underwent a drastic transformation after the horrific incident. Without family support, she spent two years in an orphanage before returning to live with her sister-in-law. She struggled with simple household chores because of her injuries. And memories of the incident haunted her. However, Rebekah has been resilient and displayed an unwavering zeal to improve. She is also doing well in school. ‚ÄúRebekah is a disciplined and dedicated student and has shown remarkable improvement in both writing and speaking English,‚Äù said her eighth-grade teacher. ‚ÄúShe actively participates in class, asking questions and completing assignments with enthusiasm. I‚Äôve formed a close bond with Rebekah, helping whenever she faces challenges. The use of effective and sufficient learning materials has proven beneficial, especially given Rebekah‚Äôs need for extensive writing practice. To further support her academic progress, I‚Äôve decided to allocate special time for private tutoring, ensuring a focused and personalized learning experience. This initiative includes scheduling sessions and communicating the plan with her guardians.‚Äù Rebekah‚Äôs sister-in-law expressed immense admiration for Rebekah‚Äôs resilient spirit and praised her growing circle of friends, particularly her close bond with schoolmates. She shared, ‚ÄúRebekah now has a multitude of friends, fostering even closer connections with her schoolmates. It‚Äôs heartwarming to see her friends visiting our home, creating a lively atmosphere with numerous children playing together.‚Äù She also expressed gratitude to International Christian Concern (ICC) which supplied Rebekah with school supplies and other support. ‚ÄúIt has significantly lightened the parental load for me. Rebekah‚Äôs academic journey has been smooth, with her never lacking any essentials. A heartfelt thank you for ensuring she has the necessary school supplies, clothes, and even food for her stay-at-home. We are genuinely happy and deeply grateful for this support.‚Äù Brimming with joy and adorned with countless smiles, Rebekah enthusiastically expressed, ‚ÄúI feel immense happiness when I have an ample supply of books at school. Not too long ago, my collection was insufficient, and most of the books were in poor condition. However, ever since International Christian Concern began providing me with books, even my left-handed writing practice has become easier. As we converse, I am thoroughly savoring every moment at school and grateful for the positive impact ICC has on my education.‚Äù Reflecting on Rebekah‚Äôs journey as a young girl, it becomes clear that she has embraced a positive perspective on life, showing considerable progress. With unwavering determination, she nurtures dreams of joining a boarding high school and achieving her long-term goals.

author: BP Editor 10
title: Loke: Ngeh‚Äôs proposal to have non-Muslim experts in Syariah law committee a mistake
text: KUALA LUMPUR (Dec 29): DAP secretary-general Anthony Loke today stressed that the proposal by Beruas MP Datuk Ngeh Koo Ham for the government to appoint non-Muslim legal experts into the special committee to study issues related to the competencies of state legislative assembly in enacting Islamic laws was a mistake and misunderstanding about the committee‚Äôs source of power. Realising that the proposal could spark controversy as DAP would be seen trying to meddle in Islamic legal affairs, Loke asserted that this is entirely untrue because the party is committed to the principle of mutual respect and harmony among religions and ethnicities. ‚ÄúThe committee was established by the Malaysian National Council for Islamic Religious Affairs (MKI), chaired by the Sultan of Selangor, Sultan Sharafuddin Idris Shah, and aims to advise the council with suggestions to empower and elevate the jurisdictions of Syariah Courts. ‚ÄúIt should be emphasised that the establishment of this special committee is not determined by the Cabinet but by MKI, and they report directly to MKI. DAP respects the wisdom of His Royal Highness the Sultan of Selangor in making any decisions regarding MKI affairs,‚Äù he said in a statement today. Loke said any proposals by the special committee involving legal amendments must be brought to the Cabinet for the usual process of legal enactments. As such, Loke said non-Muslim communities need not worry about this matter because any legal amendments involving the rights of non-Muslims must be thoroughly discussed and finalised by the Cabinet before being brought to Parliament. Yesterday, the media reported that Ngeh proposed the government appoint experts from the non-Muslim community to assist the special committee established earlier this month and to ensure that the non-Muslims‚Äô views were considered before making any changes to the laws. The proposal, however, was slammed by Umno secretary-general Datuk Dr Asyraf Wajdi Dusuki, who said that there was no need for non-Muslim experts to be appointed to the special committee. Meanwhile, Bangi Member of Parliament Syahredzan Johan through a post of X today, echoed Asyraf Wajdi‚Äôs sentiments, saying that he believed that the members of the special committee are experienced and competent in their respective fields, especially constitutional law, and would be able to conduct an objective study, going beyond considerations of their own ethnicity and religion. ‚ÄúFurthermore, the committee‚Äôs suggestions or findings are not binding on the Cabinet, and I believe that all views and further engagement sessions will be conducted before any suggestions are accepted and implemented. ‚ÄúTherefore, there is no reason to say that the views or suggestions presented to the government will be limited to one party,‚Äù he said, adding that all parties should give space to the committee to continue what has been entrusted to them to start addressing the issues that need to be fully resolved. ‚Äì Bernama

author: El Correo Gallego
title: ¬øPor qu√© se han visto esta noche auroras boreales en Santiago?
text: Por que se viron esta noite auroras boreales en Santiago? A noite deste xoves deixou unha estampa ins√≥lita na capital galega e outros puntos da comunidade Auroras boreales no ceo nocturno de Compostela [. A noite deste xoves deixou unha estampa ins√≥lita na capital galega e outros puntos da comunidade, un fen√≥meno que se debe a unha forte treboada geomagn√©tica que provocou que ditas auroras boreales v√≠sense en latitudes moito m√°is ao sur do habitual. Varias fotograf√≠as que recollen a luz avermellada no ceo danoite , que pod√≠a apreciarse mirando en direcci√≥n norte, as√≠ o testemu√±an.](https://galego.elcorreogallego.es/santiago/) Unha destas fotograf√≠as √© a que capturou Diego Cidr√°s desde o barrio do Sar das auroras boreales (as√≠ se chaman as auroras polares do hemisferio norte) que foron visibles entre as 23:00 e a 1:30 da madrugada. O fen√≥meno electromagn√©tico, propio das rexi√≥ns polares, tam√©n foi captado noutros puntos da xeograf√≠a galega como Valdovi√±o. As auroras aparecen pola interacci√≥n entre o vento solar e o campo magn√©tico da Terra. Segundo a Organizaci√≥n Meteorol√≥xica Mundial (WMO segundo as s√∫as siglas en ingl√©s) √© un electrometeoro consistente nun fen√≥meno luminoso que aparece nas capas superiores da atmosfera en forma de arcos, bandas, cortinas, etc. Por tanto, ao contrario que os fen√≥menos meteorol√≥xicos habituais, f√≥rmanse moito m√°is arriba da troposfera, normalmente a unha altitude de entre 90 e 150 quil√≥metros. As auroras polares d√©bense √° presenza de part√≠culas cargadas el√©ctricamente e eyectadas desde o sol (o vento solar), que act√∫an sobre os gases enrarecidos das capas superiores da atmosfera, de acordo coa Organizaci√≥n Meteorol√≥xica Mundial. O campo magn√©tico da Terra canaliza as part√≠culas, principalmente electr√≥ns e prot√≥ns, que chocan cos √°tomos e mol√©culas dos gases das capas superiores da atmosfera (termosfera e exosfera). Esas colisi√≥ns provocan que os electr√≥ns dos √°tomos de nitr√≥xeno e de os√≠xeno ascendan temporalmente a un estado enerx√©tico superior "excitado‚Äù, segundo explicaba a Axencia Estatal de Meteorolox√≠a en maio, cando xa [diferentes puntos da xeograf√≠a de Galicia rexistraron un fen√≥meno de auroras boreales](https://galego.elcorreogallego.es/sociedad/2024/05/11/aurora-boreal-alumbra-cielos-nocturnos-102225323.html). Ao recuperarse os niveis de enerx√≠a normais, lib√©rase enerx√≠a que se emite en forma de fot√≥ns de luz con distintas lonxitudes de onda. As auroras polares obs√©rvanse principalmente en arcos pr√≥ximos aos polos magn√©ticos (os √≥valos aurorales). Pero se a actividade solar √© moi intensa as eyecciones de masa coronal ou erupciones solares atmosf√©ricas poden intensificar o vento solar e alcanzar a magnetosfera da Terra, desencadeando unha treboada geomagn√©tica. Durante estes fen√≥menos, o √≥valo auroral ens√°nchase temporalmente, o que permite percibir auroras desde latitudes m√°is baixas. author: Pilar Espinoza
title: Clima en M√©xico hoy 22 de marzo: Frente fr√≠o traer√° fuertes lluvias y granizo
text: ¬°Pron√≥stico del clima en M√©xico! Este 22 de marzo el Frente fr√≠o No. 41 traer√° fuertes lluvias, granizo y tolnaveras, pese a ello, el calor no se acabr√°. El frente fr√≠o No. 41 provocar√° grandes efectos en clima en M√©xico este 22 de marzo, porque se esperan lluvias con intervalos de chubascos en el suroeste del Golfo de M√©xico y la Pen√≠nsula de Yucat√°n, present√°ndose lluvias puntuales fuertes, acompa√±adas de descargas el√©ctricas y ca√≠da de granizo en Puebla, Veracruz, Campeche, Yucat√°n y Quintana Roo. Tambi√©n habr√° viento de componente norte con rachas de hasta 60 km/h en el litoral de Tamaulipas, Veracruz, Tabasco y Campeche, as√≠ como viento de 40 a 60 km/h y probables tolvaneras en la Mesa del Norte y Mesa Central. Finalmente, prevalecer√° el ambiente caluroso a muy caluroso en la mayor parte del territorio nacional, con temperaturas m√°ximas superiores a 40 ¬∞C en regiones de Sinaloa, Nayarit, Jalisco, Colima, Michoac√°n, Guerrero, Morelos (sur), Oaxaca, Chiapas, Tabasco, Campeche, Yucat√°n y Quintana Roo. ¬øHabr√° lluvias en M√©xico hoy? Esto dice el pron√≥stico del clima La Comisi√≥n Nacional del Agua ( Conagua ) establece que para este viernes 22 de marzo se esperan lluvias fuertes con puntuales muy fuertes en algunos estados de la Rep√∫blica, ¬ød√≥nde? - Chubascos con lluvias puntuales fuertes en Puebla, Veracruz, Campeche, Yucat√°n y Quintana Roo. - Intervalos de chubascos en Hidalgo, Oaxaca, Chiapas y Tabasco. - Lluvias aisladas en Nuevo Le√≥n, Tamaulipas, San Luis Potos√≠ y Quer√©taro. Las altas temperaturas continuar√°n en M√©xico; llegaremos a los 45 grados El ambiente caluroso predominar√° en M√©xico, donde algunas zonas de la Rep√∫blica Mexicana alcanzar√°n hasta los 45 grados, ¬øcu√°les ser√°n los estados m√°s afectados por las temperaturas extremas de este viernes 22 de marzo? - Temperaturas m√°ximas de 40 a 45 ¬∞C en Sinaloa, Nayarit, Jalisco, Colima, Michoac√°n, Guerrero, Morelos (sur), Oaxaca, Chiapas, Tabasco, Campeche, Yucat√°n y Quintana Roo. - Temperaturas m√°ximas de 35 a 40 ¬∞C en Tamaulipas, San Luis Potos√≠, Zacatecas, Guanajuato, Quer√©taro, Hidalgo, Estado de M√©xico (suroeste), Puebla (suroeste) y Veracruz (sur). ‚òÄÔ∏èü•µ Ayer, mi√©rcoles, se registraron 44.1 grados‚Äî CONAGUA Clima (@conagua_clima) [#Celsius]de [#Temperatura]m√°xima en Ciudad Altamirano, [#Guerrero]. Ve m√°s en el gr√°fico. Consulta diariamente los mapas de temperaturas m√≠nimas y m√°ximas en ‚¨áÔ∏è [pic.twitter.com/wijDRlrFpQ] [March 21, 2024] La CDMX podr√≠a llegar hasta lo 30 grados este viernes 22 de marzo En la Ciudad de M√©xico y Edomex se pronostica ambiente templado al amanecer y fresco en zonas altas de la regi√≥n. Por la tarde, cielo despejado, ambiente de c√°lido a caluroso y sin lluvia en ambas entidades. - Temperatura m√°xima estimada en la Ciudad de M√©xico: 29 a 31 ¬∞C. - Temperatura m√≠nima estimada en la Ciudad de M√©xico: 14 a 16 ¬∞C.

author: Emily McMinn
title: Luther Center residents begin to move back in following fire earlier this month | News | wrex.com
text: ROCKFORD, Ill. (WREX) ‚Äî Good news came this week for people who live at the Luther Center in Rockford as residents were able to begin moving back in. The move came less than two weeks after an electrical fire broke out that forced more than 200 people from their home. Many of these people stayed in a hotel for the past week and half but were able to move home starting Tuesday. This date was earlier than scheduled as they were originally told they would be out for at least two weeks. The Salvation Army stepped in to provide transportation for those residents back to their apartment. "For me I was impressed. When you do hear about fire and you think about an electrical system, what did it hurt in the electrical system, when there's a fire how much smoke, where did it go? That can cause a lot of damage too, but it sounds like to me from everything I'm hearing it was a centralized location," Monty Wandling, the Coordinator for the Salvation Army of Winnebago County said. Wandling also added that residents were pleased to get back to a sense of normalcy. "It's just nice to see. I know they were very relieved and good to get out of the hotel. They were well cared for and were excited about that and our part on this one was literally saying, "Hey, we've got some vehicles, and we can take some time and help get people home," Wandling said. At the time of the fire, it was estimated the Luther Center had over $500,000 worth of damage.

author: Emily Goodman
title: Not a big snow coming in
text: Another gloomy day has been the case here in Kentucky today and that is because a low pressure is moving our way from the Midwest. The chance for us to pick up some rain and snow mixing showers is there, but this will not be a big snow-maker by any means. Most of what we see in western KY will encounter some drier air and fall apart by the time it reaches the Lexington area. This means you may see some snowflakes, but very little to no accumulation. Our southeastern mountain counties have the better chance. Once we move past this system, we will have drier weather enter the scene for the holiday weekend. New Year's Eve will be the mildest day with temperatures in the upper 40s with some sun. New Year's Day will be back to the freezer with highs in the upper 30s and dry. Most of next week looks dry, too. Posted at 5:27 PM, Dec 28, 2023 and last updated 2023-12-28 17:48:55-05 Copyright 2023 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.

author: @MiningDotCom
title: Copper price bounces as analysts see short covering fueling big gains - MINING.COM
text: Copper extended a weekly gain, with some analysts predicting that the market could soon turn decisively higher as bearish investors are forced to unwind heavy bets against the metal viewed as a global economic bellwether. Prices climbed as much as 1.5% to trade above $8,300 a ton on the London Metal Exchange, trimming losses racked up this month amid a slowdown in China and strong economic conditions in the US that could keep interest rates elevated for longer. Following the release of US consumer price data, which rose more than forecast in January, Fed Vice Chair for Supervision Michael Barr said US policymakers need to see stronger proof inflation was heading back to target levels before they start cutting borrowing costs. Typically, higher interest rates are negative for metals as they squeeze manufacturers and consumers. Trend-following investors have built up record short positions in copper contracts during the recent selloff, but prices could quickly turn higher if they start unwinding their positions, Daniel Ghali, senior commodity strategist at TD Securities, said in an emailed note. ‚ÄúIn copper markets, the pain trade is to the upside ‚Äî and while the first buying program is already hitting the tapes, a break north of $8,350/t on an LME monthly basis could spark large-scale buying activity,‚Äù he wrote. ‚ÄúThis could fuel a virtuous cycle, as the large-scale algo buying activity could catalyze additional buying programs.‚Äù Copper rose to a high of $8,320 a ton on the LME and was trading up 1.5% at $8,318 a ton as of 5:07 p.m. local time. Zinc and lead were also higher, while nickel slipped further despite fresh evidence of the pain that low prices are causing producers. Nickel prices have almost halved since the start of 2023, hit by surging supplies. On Thursday, the world‚Äôs largest miner BHP Group Ltd. said it [had taken a $2.5 billion impairment](https://www.mining.com/web/bhp-group-warns-of-2-5-billion-non-cash-charge-from-nickel-operations/) on the value of its Australian nickel assets, adding to a string of recent writedowns and closures. The pressure on western nickel miners is growing as production surges in Indonesia, with the country now accounting for more than half of the world‚Äôs supply. Indonesian exports of nickel in all forms jumped by 28% to 1.8 million tons in 2023, equal to 53% of global output, analysts at Macquarie said in an emailed report. The slump in prices meant export revenues only rose 1%, the bank added. (By Mark Burton)
